description: Operation details for summer farmers' market in Boston. Subject to change in future; information listed is accurate as of Spring 2013. All markets have at least one vendor who accepts WIC/Senior FMNP benefits; many, but not all, markets also accept SNAP and EBT/Boston Bounty Bucks benefits.

name: Summer Farmers' Markets
